name: tiddlywink
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the small round pieces used in the game of tiddlywinks: The longest distance to which a standard tiddlywink has been flicked is 3.85 metres. Use a large tiddlywink to press and flick the smaller counters. See
tiddlywinks
Dorling Kindersley/ Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThat little old manhole cover looks like a tiddlywink.We are each given a tiddlywink, exchangeable for a drink.Passengers buy a small plastic token, like an overgrown tiddlywink, which is scanned at the gates.
